name: üíº In between jobs
description: Introspection, wandering and looking for the next challenge
paragraphs: At the end of 2023, the startup I was working with missed financial goals. It had to restructure dramatically and I was laid off.
While I am sad for the loss (I loved my team and what we were trying to do, and had nice income), I can't help but feel excited for this opportunity I would not otherwise have.
What is next for me? I loved the startup life of trying to fight the odds and building something new in a tight-knit team environment.

name: üè† Hometrail
description: React Native prototype app for end-to-end home rental management
paragraphs: This is a project I am developing with an entrepeneurial friend.
Feedback from VCs he has spoken to indicates that a prototype to demo with could bolster his chances of getting funded.
For me this is an awesome way to get cozy with React Native while also flexing my product muscle: what features are absolutely necessary in the prototype? What outcomes does it propose to achieve?
I love a chance to delete things and build the minimum!

name: üéæ Computer vision: Padel
description: Trying to detect stuff in Padel matches
paragraphs: I play this sport called Padel, it's like tennis but played in teams of 2 versus 2, in a smaller court with walls all around it.
Thing is, although I play loads, sometimes it's hard to know what I am doing wrong and how to improve.
It got me thinking, what if I film my games and then explore computer vision more deeply by trying to use it to get insights?
